'''Secret Source Scout Sweeper''' is a type of [[fish]] that can be found in [[Natlan]] and be used as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]]. Secret Source Scout Sweeper can be obtained through fishing using {{Item|Emberglow Bait|20}}.
